flawed_nl_solution:
He uses 11 buckets to fill his bath normally because 14 - 3 = <<14-3=11>>11
He uses 1302 ounces a day for his baths because 11 x 120 = <<11*120=1302>>1302
He uses 9114 ounces a week for his baths because 7 x 1302 = <<7*1302=9114>>9114

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1320, not 1302. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
